commit.message:
Rollup merge of #73506 - Xanewok:update-rls, r=Xanewok

Bump Rustfmt and RLS

Fixes #73406
Fixes #73199
Fixes #73407
Fixes #73200

cc @calebcartwright @topecongiro

r? @ghost

Let's see what CI says first
